title: File Size
body:
I've moved a little over a year ago and would like to know how big the ENTIRE file size is for League. Would like to download on new PC but have Data limitations. 

Just want to know if its possible within a reasonable price

replies.body: Base install takes me around 14Gb of data ! As i run out of good bandwidth it took a day to download @ 1MbPs :/  no data limitations, it checks automatically for your installing P.C / Laptop and **installs at 14Gb with then renders to 12G where i ran at 2Gb VGA**. Aswell i donwloaded on my PC with **1Gb VGA it did download at 9.5Gb of data on software then installed at 8Gb data.**

Hey there,

My current install for league of legends clocks in at around 12.2GB however I'm unsure how much of this would be included in a base install.
